body: Lol mc's japanese name and self narration is already on the 2nd page where he talks about having sex with Utaha Senpai himself. Yet there's people who still misread as her NTR with someone else. But this is in fact a NTR if based on the anime canon. They are NTR on Katou-san. But she's who I'll choose if I'm Tomoya. Utaha is sexy, intelligent, beautiful, rich and in love with Tomoya. She's basically the best wifu in this universe.
